00042 #define INFINITY 2147483647 /* 2^31 -1 */
00043 
00048 struct Odometer2
00049 {
00050     /* Wheel anatomy */
00051     int wheelDiameter;   
00052     int axialLength;     
00053     int gearRatio;       
00054     int leftWheelMotor;  
00055     int rightWheelMotor; 
00057     /* Accumulative position, time and samles count since the begining */
00058     Vector cumulativePosition;
00059     long cumulativeTime;
00060     long cumulativeSamplesCount;
00061 
00062     /* Accumulative position, time and samles count since the delta clear */
00063     bool enableDeltaPosition;
00064     Vector deltaPosition;
00065     long deltaTime;
00066     long deltaSamplesCount;
00067     
00068     /* Last sample: dx, position moved in last sample and dt sample period */
00069     bool enableDPosition;
00070     Vector dPosition;
00071     long dTime;
00072     
00073     /* Speed of movement */
00074     long speed;
00075 
00076     /* Last states used for internal computation */
00077     long lastTachoLeft;
00078     long lastTachoRight;
00079     long lastSampleTime;
00080 };
00081 
00093 safecall void Odometer2Step(Odometer2 &wheelBase)
00094 {
00095     long tachoLeft = GetOutput(wheelBase.leftWheelMotor, RotationCount);
00096     long tachoRight = GetOutput(wheelBase.rightWheelMotor, RotationCount);
00097     long dLeftTacho = (tachoLeft - wheelBase.lastTachoLeft);
00098     long dRightTacho = (tachoRight - wheelBase.lastTachoRight);
00099     long tick = CurrentTick();
00100     
00101     /* The actual v is also supposed to be divided by 22918.31 as per
00102      * the equation, but we will defer it for more approriate time to
00103      * preserve integer precision.
00104      */
00105     long v = (((dLeftTacho + dRightTacho) *
00106                 wheelBase.wheelDiameter) * wheelBase.gearRatio);
00107     long w = ((dRightTacho - dLeftTacho) * wheelBase.wheelDiameter *
00108                 wheelBase.gearRatio)/(wheelBase.axialLength * 200);
00109 
00110     /* dx odometry */
00111     if (wheelBase.enableDPosition)
00112     {
00113         wheelBase.dPosition.theta = w;
00114         wheelBase.dPosition.x = (v * Cos(w))/2291831;
00115         wheelBase.dPosition.y = (v * Sin(w))/2291831;
00116         wheelBase.dTime = tick - wheelBase.lastSampleTime;
00117     }
00118 
00119     /* Delta odometry */
00120     if (wheelBase.enableDeltaPosition)
00121     {
00122         wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta = wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta + w;
00123         if (wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta >= 360)
00124             wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta %= 360;
00125         wheelBase.deltaPosition.x =
00126             wheelBase.deltaPosition.x +
00127                 ((v * Cos(wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta))/2291831);
00128         wheelBase.deltaPosition.y =
00129             wheelBase.deltaPosition.y +
00130                 ((v * Sin(wheelBase.deltaPosition.theta))/2291831);
00131         wheelBase.deltaTime += wheelBase.dTime;
00132         wheelBase.deltaSamplesCount++;
00133     }
00134 
00135     /* Cumulative odometry */
00136     wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta =
00137         wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta + w;
00138     if (wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta >= 360)
00139         wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta %= 360;
00140     if (wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta < 0)
00141         wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta += 360;
00142     wheelBase.cumulativePosition.x =
00143         wheelBase.cumulativePosition.x +
00144             ((v * Cos(wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta))/2291831);
00145     wheelBase.cumulativePosition.y =
00146         wheelBase.cumulativePosition.y +
00147             ((v * Sin(wheelBase.cumulativePosition.theta))/2291831);
00148     wheelBase.cumulativeTime += wheelBase.dTime;
00149     wheelBase.cumulativeSamplesCount++;
00150 
00151     /* Preserve past state */
00152     wheelBase.lastTachoLeft = tachoLeft;
00153     wheelBase.lastTachoRight = tachoRight;
00154     wheelBase.lastSampleTime = tick;
00155     wheelBase.speed = (v * 1000) / wheelBase.dTime; /* 1s = 1000ms */
00156 }
00157 
00170 void Odometer2Init(Odometer2 &wheelBase,
00171                    int leftWheelMotor, int rightWheelMotor,
00172                    int axialLength, int wheelDiameter, int gearRatio,
00173                    int initialLeftTacho, int initialRightTacho,
00174                    bool enableDPosition, bool enableDeltaPosition)
00175 {
00176     wheelBase.leftWheelMotor = leftWheelMotor;
00177     wheelBase.rightWheelMotor = rightWheelMotor;
00178     wheelBase.gearRatio = gearRatio;
00179     wheelBase.axialLength = axialLength;
00180     wheelBase.wheelDiameter = wheelDiameter;
00181     wheelBase.enableDPosition = enableDPosition;
00182     wheelBase.enableDeltaPosition = enableDeltaPosition;
00183     
00184     /* Cumulative integral */
00185     VectorInit(wheelBase.cumulativePosition, 0, 0, 0);
00186     wheelBase.cumulativeTime = 0;
00187     wheelBase.cumulativeSamplesCount = 0;
00188     
00189     /* Delta integral */
00190     VectorInit(wheelBase.deltaPosition, 0, 0, 0);
00191     wheelBase.deltaTime = 0;
00192     wheelBase.deltaSamplesCount = 0;
00193 
00194     /* dx and dt */
00195     VectorInit(wheelBase.dPosition, 0, 0, 0);
00196     wheelBase.dTime = 0;
00197 
00198     wheelBase.speed = 0;
00199     wheelBase.lastTachoLeft = initialLeftTacho;
00200     wheelBase.lastTachoRight = initialRightTacho;
00201     wheelBase.lastSampleTime = 0;
00202 }
00203 
00208 inline void Odometer2GetCumulativePosition (Odometer2 odometer, Vector &retPosition)
00209 {
00210     retPosition = odometer.cumulativePosition;
00211 }
00212 
00217 inline long Odometer2GetCumulativeSamplesCount (Odometer2 odometer)
00218 {
00219     return odometer.cumulativeSamplesCount;
00220 }
00221 
00226 inline void Odometer2GetDeltaPosition (Odometer2 odometer, Vector &retPosition)
00227 {
00228     retPosition = odometer.deltaPosition;
00229 }
00230 
00234 inline long Odometer2GetDeltaSamplesCount (Odometer2 odometer)
00235 {
00236     return odometer.deltaSamplesCount;
00237 }
00238 
00249 inline void Odometer2SetDriftCorrection (Odometer2 odometer, Vector &correction,
00250                                          Vector &retDeltaPosition)
00251 {
00252     int deltaAngle;
00253     long deltaDistance;
00254     
00255     odometer.cumulativePosition = correction;
00256 
00257     deltaAngle = odometer.deltaPosition.theta + correction.theta;
00258     deltaDistance = VectorGetDistance(odometer.deltaPosition);
00259     
00260     VectorTranslate(odometer.cumulativePosition, deltaDistance, deltaAngle);
00261     retDeltaPosition = odometer.deltaPosition;
00262     VectorInit(odometer.deltaPosition, 0, 0, 0);
00263 }

00265 /* test for odometer */
00266 #ifdef ENABLE_TEST
00267 
00268 int lastX = 0;
00269 int lastY = 0;
00270 void Plot(Vector &pos, int min, int max)
00271 {
00272      int x = (pos.x - min) * 63 / (max - min);
00273      int y = (pos.y - min) * 63 / (max - min);
00274 
00275      if (x > 63) x = 63;
00276      if (y < 0) y = 0;
00277 
00278      if (lastX != 0 && lastY != 0)
00279          LineOut(lastX, lastY, x, y, false);
00280      /*
00281      int tangentX;
00282      int tangentY;
00283      if (pos.theta < 90)
00284      {
00285          tangentX = 10 * Cos(pos.theta);
00286          tangentY = 10 * Sin(pos.theta);
00287      }
00288      else if (pos.theta < 180)
00289      {
00290          tangentX = -10 * Cos(pos.theta - 90);
00291          tangentY = 10 * Sin(pos.theta - 90);
00292      }
00293      else if (pos.theta < 270)
00294      {
00295          tangentX = 10 * Cos(pos.theta);
00296          tangentY = 10 * Sin(pos.theta);
00297      }
00298      else
00299      {
00300          tangentX = 10 * Cos(pos.theta);
00301          tangentY = 10 * Sin(pos.theta);
00302      }
00303      */
00304      int tangentX = x + Cos(pos.theta) / 20;
00305      int tangentY = y + Sin(pos.theta) / 20;
00306 
00307      //LineOut(x, y, tangentX, tangentY, false);
00308      lastX = x;
00309      lastY = y;
00310 }
00311 
00312 #define AXIAL         83
00313 #define WHEEL_DIA     56
00314 #define SAMPLING_RATE 100
00315 void TestOdometer2 ()
00316 {
00317     OnFwdSync(OUT_BC, 20, 100);
00318     Odometer2 robot;
00319     //SetOutput(OUT_BC, UpdateFlags, UF_UPDATE_RESET_BLOCK_COUNT);
00320     Odometer2Init(robot, OUT_B, OUT_C, AXIAL, WHEEL_DIA, 100, 0, 0, true, true);
00321 
00322     ClearScreen();
00323     LineOut(0, 32, 63, 32, false);
00324     LineOut(32, 0, 32, 63, false);
00325 
00326     while(true)
00327     {
00328         Vector pos;
00329         Odometer2Step(robot);
00330         Odometer2GetDeltaPosition(robot, pos);
00331         Plot(pos, -550, 550);
00332         if (Abs(pos.theta) > 90) break;
00333         Wait(50);
00334     }
00335     Off(OUT_BC);
00336     TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Wheel tested");
00337     Wait(20000);
00338 }
00339 
00340 #endif /* ENABLE_TEST */
